short_description: westbourne civil engineering is an asphalt & paving services company based in manchester, united kingdom.
long_description: westbourne civil engineering is a family company established in 2008 and now grown to over 300 skilled people working in a productive and enjoyable environment. we continue to invest in new plant and vehicles and are developing a new plant workshop and training facility building. with sites across the north of england and a head office in manchester, westbourne has established a reputation for outstanding quality of work. our dedicated management team oversee the technical aspects of each project to ensure quality is maintained at every stage. we are known as problem solvers and have established close relationships with the uk's leading house builders and private developers over many years. we've invested in the best fleet of plant and equipment and deliver a huge amount of training to our teams. and we strive to provide the conditions in which all of us can thrive by treating one another with respect. our sewer work protects water courses and wildlife. we use high quality, locally sourced, and recylced materials wherever possible to minimise transport miles, energy use, pollution and waste.

generated_description: westbourne civil engineering, legally known as westbourne civil engineering ltd., is a family-owned company based in manchester, england, established in 2008. the company specializes in groundworks and foundations, sewers and drainage, highways, and hard landscaping. with over 300 skilled employees, westbourne civil engineering is known for its high-quality work and commitment to health and safety. the company operates across the northern region of england and has established a reputation for excellence in the construction industry. westbourne civil engineering prioritizes sustainable practices and has achieved iso 9001 accreditation.
